author: chosila
body:
**PR description:**

This PR introduces more types of jets under ParticleFlow in the DQM root files. This adds AK4 CHS and PUPPI, both with and without jet energy correction to DQM files. This change can be seen in the DQM files under ParticleFlow/Run summary/JetResponse. Before, JetResponse will contain the histograms of 1 type of jet, but in this PR it will contain slimmedJets/JEC, slimmedJets/noJEC, slimmedJetsPuppi/JEC, and slimmedJetsPuppi/noJEC. Histograms of jets without energy correction will have "Raw" in the title to distinguish them from ones with jet energy correction. 

test/compare.py was also changed to accommodate the folder structure changes. 


**PR validation:**

[http://hep.baylor.edu/chosila/PFVal/plots_fixedName/test_pf.html](http://hep.baylor.edu/chosila/PFVal/plots_fixedName/test_pf.html)

Shows the histograms made with compare.py and the DQM files made using the modified scrips in this PR. The sampled used in the plots were the same QCD sample, so it looks like only 1 sample is visible.  


> nohup runTheMatrix.py -l 11634.0 -j 8 &>11634.0.log &
> nohup runTheMatrix.py -l 23234.0 -j 8 &>23234.0.log &

were also ran in addition to the QCD samples, and it produces the same expected outputs. 
[http://hep.baylor.edu/chosila/PFVal/plots_TTbar/TTbar_pf.html](http://hep.baylor.edu/chosila/PFVal/plots_TTbar/TTbar_pf.html) shows the plots made with compare.py using the DQM files made with the above runTheMatrix.py 

**if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:**

This PR is not a backport. 



@hatakeyamak @bendavid @juska
title: Pf validation update
